basics.name: Àlex Fernández
basics.label: Software Engineer and Full stack developer
basics.summary1: My name is Àlex, I am 24, and I live in Barcelona. I love going to the gym, to have dinner with my friends, and being up-to-date of the news around the developing world.
basics.summary2: I have a Computer Engineering Bachelor Degree, specialized in Software Engineering. I enjoy building all kind of applications and discovering new ways to create solutions for all of us.
basics.summary3: My goal is to grow as a professional and as a person, and to be able to contribute to the world with my knowledge and my work. I am always open to new opportunities and exciting challenges.

work.name: NTT DATA
work.summary1: Member of a development team in the consultancy, building applications for our clients using the latest technologies and methodologies.
work.summary2: Partaking in frontend and backend development, as well as lending a hand on the architecture and design of the applications.

work.name: ITeC
work.summary1: Worked developing and maintaining the company's application, as well as developing new features and functionalities.
